dcterms:creator: N. Andrianov
F. Coquel
M. Postel
Q. H. Tran
dcterms:description: A synthetic two-phase isothermal gas-liquid flow dataset used to demonstrate the forecasting capability of LSTM models in predicting liquid and gas rates based on pressure readings.
dcterms:title: Severe Slugging Dataset

dcterms:creator: J. Briers
K. Goh
A. Sniekers
D. Schotanus
J. Hofland
D. Adun
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of pressure, temperature, and multiphase rates measurements during a well test, used to evaluate the forecasting accuracy of LSTM models in a changing flow environment.
dcterms:title: Variable Rate Well Test Dataset
